attributes.action: make it illegal to kick footballs etc against the walls of private propertys.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am wanting to make it a criminal offence for youths or adults to play ball games on the walls of peoples private property.
It causes damage to the walls, possible damage to the tiles, aswell as being a real nusance to the owners or tennants that live in these propertys

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
